items.content_html: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.
items.title: AbdulmalekAlshugaa/netly-rn-expo: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.

items.content_html: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.
items.title: somritdasgupta/queFork: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.

items.content_html: A lightweight development web server.
items.title: akiraohgaki/devsrv: A lightweight development web server.

items.content_html: The Mini POS ÓÇÅPoint of Sale) API System is a lightweight backend designed for managing users, products, and invoices. It follows RESTful API principles, using Node.js, Express.js, JSON Web Token, Bcryptjs and MongoDB (via Mongoose) for data management.
items.title: maryam274/Mini-POS-API-System-: The Mini POS ÓÇÅPoint of Sale) API System is a lightweight backend designed for managing users, products, and invoices.  It follows RESTful API principles, using Node.js, Express.js, JSON Web Token, Bcryptjs and MongoDB (via Mongoose)  for data management.

items.content_html: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory. Not really intended as a consumer facing application, it's intended as a separate deployment to serverless providers that don't have dedicated file management built-in.
items.title: zacheryvaughn/network-volume-manager: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory. Not really intended as a consumer facing application, it's intended as a separate deployment to serverless providers that don't have dedicated file management built-in.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible library for working with Deno KV. It simplifies database interactions in Deno applications.
items.title: MrSIHAB/easykv: A lightweight and flexible library for working with Deno KV. It simplifies database interactions in Deno applications.

items.content_html: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.
items.title: jspreadsheet/openetl: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

items.title: ArnaudBuchholz/reserve: Lightweight http server configurable using regular expressions

items.title: nuckle/youtube-channel-id-extractor: A lightweight tool to extract YouTube channel IDs from any type of URL, including videos, playlists, and community posts

items.content_html: A flexible and lightweight SDK for building Paypal REST API with dynamic endpoints, caching, and response transformations.
items.title: nuecms/paypal-sdk: A flexible and lightweight SDK for building Paypal REST API with dynamic endpoints, caching, and response transformations.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript utility providing efficient, O(1) ordered list management in databases, simplifying insertions and reordering.
items.title: goatplatform/orderstamp-js: A lightweight TypeScript utility providing efficient, O(1) ordered list management in databases, simplifying insertions and reordering.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive programming library for JavaScript and TypeScript, offering RxJS-like functionality through generator-based streams for efficient async data processing.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive programming library for JavaScript and TypeScript, offering RxJS-like functionality through generator-based streams for efficient async data processing.

items.content_html: Ollama VIC-20 is a private ultra lightweight frontend for Ollama designed to stay under 20 kilobytes on disk.
items.title: shokuninstudio/Ollama-VIC-20: Ollama VIC-20 is a private ultra lightweight frontend for Ollama designed to stay under 20 kilobytes on disk.

items.content_html: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection.
items.title: arijitcodes/microstream-client: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection.

items.title: krschroeder/base-elem-js: Very lightweight Dom manipulation and creation library

items.content_html: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.
items.title: arijitcodes/microstream-hub: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.

items.content_html: Notifier-Mycin is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-use notification toast library built with Toastify-js and designed to work seamlessly with Bun. It allows you to display beautiful, animated notifications (toasts) in your web applications with minimal setup.
items.title: mmycin/notifier-mycin: Notifier-Mycin is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-use notification toast library built with Toastify-js and designed to work seamlessly with Bun. It allows you to display beautiful, animated notifications (toasts) in your web applications with minimal setup.
